Name: Sian
Details: Housing the Forbidden City, the capital city of both the world and the Confederation, after Capella was devastated during the Age of War, Sian is a tropical planet mostly kept undeveloped. Being the center of the Confederation's government and housing several key industrial factories owned by Ceres Metals Industries and Hellespont Industrials, the world is garrisoned by the Red Lancers and rotating Warrior House battalions.
